price: Wͻkaa sε: “Saa ara na wo Wura Nyankopͻn aka. Nokorε sε Ɔne Onyansafoͻ no, Ɔne Onimdefoͻ no.
arabic: قَالُواْ كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qālū kadhāliki qāla rabbuki innahu huwa al-ḥakīmu al-ʿalīmu
